about.introduction: I am a passionate and proactive engineering student dedicated to creating innovative and practical technology solutions. I enjoy transforming complex challenges into clear, efficient systems through hands-on experience and creative thinking.
about.description: As an aspiring engineer with a focus on electronic information and intelligent hardware, I have a solid foundation in both software development and hardware systems—from circuit analysis and signal processing to embedded programming and wireless technology. I’m passionate about building real-world solutions that integrate smart design with reliable engineering.
